title: Looking for Xayah
body:
Hi, I just bought the new Rakan skin and I'm looking for a Xayah to play with, because I think playing Rakan without Xayah isn't even half the fun. Soo yeah if you wanna play just add me (I'm pretty bad tho so don't expect anything great).
Region is EUW and name is 13900IPForMemes but I think you can see that here (I don't really use the boards so idk)
I really wish to find someone because it is so hard to get random players to play Xayah when that wasn't what they wanted in the first place.
